Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this past season, his second in the NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation. September 5, 2002 Report Shaffer wrote on September 5, 2002 that he had been asked by Donald Rumsfeld what the U.S. did not know in terms of percentage about Iraq's WMD program. We've struggled to estimate unknowns, and the attached briefing sumps up our best J2 sense, he said. J2 is an intelligence group supporting top level U.S. defense officials.`` We range from 0% to about 75% knowledge on various aspects of their program,'' he said.
